item.description: This is a free introductory seminar on shadow work meant to help you get acquainted with your shadows, embrace them, learn how they serve you and how you may walk with them in a new way. Facilitated by Judy. A Longer program will be offered in the near future.  The perfect event for the summer solstice!  7-8:30 pm, walk in.
item.how_to_find_us: Enter door next to H&R Block, go up one flight to B
item.why: Note date change to Tuesday, June 21. Let go and heal by bringing to Light those aspects that lay hiding or are in the way of how you want to be in life. Learn about your personal shadows and how to heal, integrate and align them with your Light.
item.name: Shed Light on Your Shadows- free event with Judy
